Title: Fire Detected
Summary: A fire has been detected in Room 101. Immediate evacuation is required.

Title: High CO2 Levels
Summary: CO2 levels have reached a dangerous level in Room 202. Ventilation required.

Title: Unauthorized Entry
Summary: An unauthorized individual has been detected in Room 305.

Title: Temperature Alert
Summary: The temperature in Room 410 has exceeded the normal threshold.

Title: Humidity Warning
Summary: Humidity levels in Room 208 have risen above normal levels.
